title: Operators and Expressions
description: Learn about JavaScript operators and how to build expressions

steps.title: Arithmetic Operators
steps.code:
let a = 10;
let b = 3;

console.log(a + b); // Addition: 13
console.log(a - b); // Subtraction: 7
console.log(a * b); // Multiplication: 30
console.log(a / b); // Division: 3.333...
console.log(a % b); // Modulus: 1

steps.title: Comparison Operators
steps.description: Compare values and return boolean results
steps.code:
let x = 5;
let y = '5';

console.log(x == y);  // true (loose equality)
console.log(x === y); // false (strict equality)
console.log(x != y);  // false
console.log(x !== y); // true
console.log(x > 3);   // true
console.log(x <= 5);  // true

steps.title: Logical Operators
Assignment Operators
steps.code:
let score = 10;

score += 5;  // score = score + 5 (15)
score -= 3;  // score = score - 3 (12)
score *= 2;  // score = score * 2 (24)
score /= 4;  // score = score / 4 (6)

console.log(score); // 6
